ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( Opportunity__r.RecordType.Id <> '01261000000X2LB', $Setup.ORE__c.Bypass__c =False, $Setup.ORE__c.StageBypass__c=False, !ISBLANK(Opportunity__c), TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName)="Docs In" || TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = "Docs Out" || TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = "Docs Requested" || TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = "Funding" || TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = "Booking" || TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = "Funded/Booked"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Dealer Changes are not allowed once App is approved
